short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly chat with the selected text on the current webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:
ConsoleX Instant Chat is a powerful Chrome extension that allows you to effortlessly engage in instant chat with any text on web pages. Simply select the text, and initiate a quick chat session using the default AI model from ConsoleX.ai to receive instant responses.

Key Features:
• Select and Chat: Initiate AI conversations with any selected text on web pages
• Smart Assistant: Leverage ConsoleX.ai's default model for accurate and insightful replies
• Seamless Integration: Enhance your browsing experience and boost productivity
• Auto save history: The chat history is automatically saved on ConsoleX.ai

Installation:

Search for "Instant Chat" in the Chrome Web Store
Click the "Add to Chrome" button
Confirm installation permissions
Once installed, you'll see the Instant Chat icon in your Chrome toolbar
Start using Instant Chat and experience the convenience and joy of intelligent conversations!
long.zh_CN:
简介:
ConsoleX Instant Chat是一款强大的Chrome扩展,让您可以轻松地与网页上的任何文字进行即时对话。只需选中文本,即可使用ConsoleX.ai的默认AI模型快速发起对话,获得智能回复。

主要功能:
• 选中即对话:选择网页上的任何文字,一键发起AI对话
• 智能助手:利用ConsoleX.ai的默认模型,获得准确、有见地的回复
• 便捷操作:无缝集成到您的浏览体验中,提高工作和学习效率
• 自动保存历史:您的对话历史自动保存到ConsoleX.ai的云端

安装方式:

在Chrome网上应用店搜索"Instant Chat"
点击"添加至Chrome"按钮
确认安装权限
安装完成后,即可在Chrome工具栏看到Instant Chat图标
开始使用Instant Chat,体验智能对话的便捷与乐趣!
